doc.title: 888-Go-Kosher
doc.plot: 888-Go-Kosher follows a day in the life of New York City's only rapid-response kitchen koshering service. Operating out of his office in Brooklyn, Rabbi Sholtiel Lebovic helps those in need, answering calls and snapping into action with his full-service team to kosher kitchens across the New York area. 888-Go-Kosher offers a light-hearted portrait of this unique service, and demonstrates the relationship of kashrut to Jewish identity.
